short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful and intuitive AI text formatter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocEase is a powerful and intuitive text formatter designed to streamline your writing workflow. Simply paste your raw text, and DocEase automatically converts it into beautifully structured, formatted content that's ready to be copied into Google Docs or any other platform. DocEase automatically handles all your formatting needs - headings, font styles, tables, and more - with just one click.
